---
title: "SPP for SMC"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(forecast)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
SMC <- read_csv("~/R/SPP/CSV/SMC.csv", col_types = cols(Week = col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d")))
smc <- ts(SMC[,2], freq=365.25/7, start=2015+44/365.25)
smc %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
plot(decompose(smc))
```

```{r}
training_smc <- subset(smc, end=length(smc)-3)
test_smc <- subset(smc, start=length(smc)-2)
fc_training_smc<-forecast(training_smc)
fc_training_smc %>%
  forecast(h=26) %>%
  autoplot() +autolayer(test_smc)
```

```{r}
fc_training_smc
```

```{r}
fc_smc<-forecast(smc)
fc_smc %>%
forecast(h=26) %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
fc_smc
```

```{r}
accuracy(fc_smc)
```
